{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-C |revision=4 (4GB) |asin=B088CYXK6W |price=50 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |availability=currently shipping |est_release_date=04/2020 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5.5-15.5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905X3 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A8G165WC-BCTD |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Super Speed USB 3.1 Gen1 Hub Controller;VIA Labs;VL817;;1;,,, 512Kbit Serial Flash Memory w/ Multi I/O SPI;ISSI;IS25LQ512B;;1;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;2;,,, 50mΩ, Single Power Switch with Flag;JoulWatt;JW7111;;2;,,, High-Side Power Switch for USB;Richtek;RT9715;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS Linear Regulator;First Silicon;FC8731;;3;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD2EUSB30;;8;,,, 24V, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter:JoulWatt;JW5057;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;4; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, SPDIF, IR receiver, GPIO, I2C, SPI, ADC header, heatsink, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01-01980;-gce36c0a; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.219;Ubuntu 20.04; |tp_firmware=Android PIE, Armbian, CoreELEC, Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), Manjaro ARM |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=odroid }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-C4}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-c4/ Product page]
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-c4/odroid-c4 ''ODROID-C4'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/04/23/50-odroid-c4-raspberry-pi-4-competitor-combines-amlogic-s905x3-soc-with-4gb-ram/ ''ODROID-C4 Raspberry Pi 4 Competitor'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/odroid-c4-could-be-the-odroid-youre-looking-for/ ''Odroid-C4 could be the Odroid you’re looking for'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905X3 @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G31 @650MHz (OpenGL ES 3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: eMMC 5.0 connector, :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC Card slot *RAM: 4GB (DDR4) @2666MHz *USB: 4x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *LAN: 1x GbE port
===See also=== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-C4]] - ''Amlogic'' S905X3 4-cores ARM Cortex-A55 CPU @2.0GHz <!-- *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU -->
